recently_narrative:
The most significant operational pattern observed is a strategic shift towards AI-powered features and integrations across Zendesk's product suite, as evidenced by the announcements of AI-driven contact center enhancements, outcome-based pricing, and integrations with external systems like AWS Support API.

This shift suggests that Zendesk administrators need to prioritize upskilling their teams on AI-powered tools and processes, as well as carefully plan and test the implementation of these new features to ensure seamless integration with existing workflows and avoid potential stability issues.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
